section_title: Ozone layer and global climate system
sentences: The SBSTA considered the IPCC/TEAP Special Report on Safeguarding the Ozone Layer and the Global System.

Delegates were briefed on a recent meeting of experts on the extent of current and future requirements for the collection and disposition of non-reusable and unwanted ozone-depleting substances in Montreal Protocol Article 5 parties(c ertain developing countries).
